metadata.title: CVE-2013-0178 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Insecure temporary file vulnerability in Redis before 2.6 related to/tmp/redis-%p.vm.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0178` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis-sentinel - 2:3.0.6-1
redis-server - 2:3.0.6-1
redis-tools - 2:3.0.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.0.6-1').
